name: Paranormal Recording Activity
description:
Do you love horror games that make you scared? You want some suspense in your life and want to see some paranormal events? Here you are. Do you want to record something unusual in your scary camera? Make the most horror story ever. There are many haunted games on the Play store but this is the scary game as well as you need to solve the mystery behind this suspense story. Let’s find out the secret mission. Don’t forget to take the camera recorder with you as you need to record each and every single paranormal events on your scary camera.
Do you want to solve the mystery that has been unsolved for many years? You are in a secret mission now and you need to record the paranormal horror story in your camera recorder. The ghost camera is with you all the time. You are now a part of the horror house escape game and you need to find out the haunted events and record in to your scary camera. Don’t be scared of the abandoned house because you have been assigned the horror secret mission and need to think about the escape plan then.
Welcome to the haunted mansion!! You are now in the abandoned place far away from the crowded city. The scary camera recorder is with you and you need to record everything in this old dark house. It’s a night time and everything is black out here. Be careful!! This is the old abandoned castle where you need to capture everything in the camera recording to find out the real paranormal horror events.Explore the scary asylum. Experience the strange unusual events happening in the haunted scary house.
Enter in to the old haunted mansion and start the camera recording in the abandoned house. Move forward to explore the mystery of this scary asylum now. There is no one in this escape house and it’s so dark here that you can see only through the camera recorder flash. You are feeling something creepy in this old house. Listen carefully to the sounds you are feeling far away from you.Explore the whole paranormal horror house. Hey! Are you listening that someone is crying? Oh no! There is something unusual in this scary horror house. Search for the crying sounds where it’s coming from. Capture that in your ghost camera recorder.
You need to spend some days in this haunted mansion to make some suspense horror story. Reach to the crying baby and capture in the camera recorder. Your ultimate mission is to find out the ghost and start the camera recording as soon as you find out the scary man otherwise you will be in his trap forever. So you need to be very careful for this is about your life. Make an escape plan as well as that must be your ultimate goal to achieve after the ghost camera recording.
You will experience the unusual paranormal events in this old haunted mansion where you are the only one who needs to explore and capture some strange happenings in the scary camera recorder.Complete the targets of the secret mission each day. This scary asylum will take you to the other level of the horror story. Take out the ghost camera now and make the perfect camera recording now.

HOW TO PLAY
Start the secret mission in the haunted mansion
Choose the color of the camera recording
You are now in the old abandoned horror castle
You have 5 days to explore the mystery
Capture the paranormal events in the camera recorder

FEATURES
Old abandoned scary asylum environment
Different colors for the ghost camera recorder like red, blue and green
5 days to complete the target
Experience the horror story in the old castle
Scary camera recorder for the recording
Real suspense and terror
